plot: A triangle of youngsters is reconnecting years after a bad accident happened. Afraid to reveal their true identity things start to repeat themselves without them being able to change it till their youth blazes up in flames.
title: Black Eyed Sun
plot_es: A triangle of youngsters is reconnecting years after a bad accident happened. Afraid to reveal their true identity things start to repeat themselves without them being able to change it till their youth blazes up in flames.
plot_en: A triangle of youngsters is reconnecting years after a bad accident happened. Afraid to reveal their true identity things start to repeat themselves without them being able to change it till their youth blazes up in flames.
